name: quantified intracranial hemorrhage
description: A condition characterized by the presence of blood within the brain tissue and associated perfusion metrics measured by CT.

attributes.name: hd1 volume
attributes.description: Volume of hemorrhage density region 1 in milliliters.

attributes.name: hd2 volume
attributes.description: Volume of hemorrhage density region 2 in milliliters.

attributes.name: total volume
attributes.description: Total volume of intracranial hemorrhage in milliliters.

attributes.name: rlv volume
attributes.description: Volume of the right lateral ventricle in milliliters.

attributes.name: llv volume
attributes.description: Volume of the left lateral ventricle in milliliters.

attributes.name: lv asymmetry ratio
attributes.description: Ratio of right lateral ventricle volume to left lateral ventricle volume.
